title: Epi-Flow
description: A unified, end-centric pipeline for processing chromatin accessibility and occupancy assays—from ATAC-seq to CUT&RUN, ChIP-seq, and beyond.

title: ComplexMap
description: A Toolset for the Functional Analysis and Visualization of Protein Complex Data

title: Single-Cell Feature Profiler
description: A powerful, multi-interface Python package for deep characterization of gene expression patterns from single-cell data.

title: ShinyCITExpresso
description: A ShinyApp for visualization and explorering Cellular Indexing of Transcriptomes and Epitopes by Sequencing (CITE-seq) data

title: SMAD
description: R package implements statistical modelling of affinity purification–mass spectrometry (AP-MS) data to compute confidence scores to identify bona fide protein-protein interactions (PPI).

title: GEX_Index_Builder
description: Automated RNA-seq reference builder for STAR and Salmon. Features container-aware memory detection, automatic Ensembl/GENCODE downloads, and version-controlled index generation.

title: ExpressoGEO
description: R package designed to simplify and automate the process GEO data

title: sgRNA-Exact-Match-Gene-Assoc
description: Finds exact sgRNA matches in a genome and associates them with overlapping/nearest genes.

title: RefInt
description: A curated reference interactome with true positives and negatives for benchmarking protein-protein interactions.
